title: Viewing Party Program...how do I set it to NA region?
body: I just discovered this tool, but it's showing me south america. Not seeing a way to change it. Help?

replies.body: Oh huh, guess the program isn't very active then. :\

I don't think it's showing you as South America.  The pins on the map are actually the locations of set viewing parties.  It doesn't appear there are any other current ones than these.

If you want to run your own, you can submit an application here: http://viewingparties.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/viewing-parties/submit

Hope this helps!
